name: Writhing
description:
Created for the 8 bits 2 infinity 2 button jam

You are the worm. Stay alive as long as possible!

Controls are:

Left: ⬅, <, A

Right: ➡, >, D

Avoid dirt and rocks. Aim for the expandy-thingies which make you grow big enough to break some dirt.

Try to beat my high score(1500)!

Hope you enjoy it :)
